entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow or rain. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023
